article_title: ObamaCare Slaps States With $15 Billion In New Costs

article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner

og.description: Thirty-six states that rely on private managed care programs to provide medical services to all or some of their Medicaid recipients are facing an added ObamaCare tax.
